name: Stamp Thief!
description:
You are a snail who has to deliver some letters. However, you have no stamps and don't know where the post office is. You will need to steal stamps and find the post office to win. But be careful. There are guards protecting the stamps. If they catch you, they will send you to snail jail and you can't send letters from there.

Modern City Tileset from https://emily2.itch.io/modern-city-top-down-tileset-16x16

Snail sprite from https://opengameart.org/content/medieval-wax-stamp-letters

Guard sprite from https://www.megupets.com/sassy-guards/

Stamp sprite from https://opengameart.org/content/medieval-wax-stamp-letters

Sign sprite from 

https://opengameart.org/content/lpc-sign-post
